meta.label: Check dataset against reference
meta.description: Compares feature descriptors between a reference and the current dataset

params.name: plugin_desc
params.description:
Given a reference dataset or a saved model, check for non-compliant values on new data.
* For numerical columns, check if  the ratio of samples not in the reference bounds is under the tolerance rate.
* For categorical columns, check if there are new unseen categories.

params.name: ds_ref
params.label: Reference dataset
params.description: Dataset on which feature checks are computed

params.name: model_ref
params.label: Reference model
params.description: Model on which feature checks are computed

params.name: columns_dataset
params.label: Columns to check
params.description: If empty, check all columns in this dataset

params.name: columns_model
params.label: Columns to check
params.description: If empty, check all columns used in the model

params.name: tolerance
params.label: Tolerance rate
params.description: Ratio of non-compliant data allowed in this dataset

params.name: absolute_range_desc
params.description: Check if values are in the range between the absolute min and max of the reference column
